name: OneShot Samurai
description:
A simple hack-and-slash shoot em up arcade game with a small twist, you only have one shot with your gun.

Try to get the most out of the one shot you have each wave and clean up whatever is left.

Controlls:

Move - WASD
Jump - Space (Double Jump)
Shoot - Left Mousebutton
Melee -  Right Mousebutton

Install Instructions:

Download the OneShotSamurai.zip file and unzip it. To play the game simply run the PlayGame.exe file. Windows may attempt to block the game due to an unknown publisher, simply click on more options to run it annyways.
